titlestmt.titleproper: Sonnen collection of clippings from the Reading Eagle 1964-1969
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Sonnen collection of clippings from the Reading Eagle
did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a printed history titled "Commemorating the One Hundred and Fiftieth Anniversary of the First Presbyterian Church in Reading, 1814-1964" by Richard N. Stroman and copies of newspapers clippings from the Reading Eagle in 1967-1969. Subjects include churches, birth and death announcements, baseball, and local establishments. There is no indication in the collection of who Sonnen (the creator) is.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
